kese wethath, demala janayata aamantha්ranaya kirimata nam, sinhala swoththamawadi ananyatha lanchunaya paseka la, mahawanshayata kalin buddhagama thula pawathi wishwa wibhawaya nawatha athpath karagatha yuthuwa aththeya.
